professionalSummary: With over 15 years’ experience in technology, I have contributed across a broad spectrum of roles, from data analytics and visualisation to data engineering, and most recently as a Platform Engineer. Throughout my career, I have developed and managed a variety of Business Intelligence systems, ranging from databases to reporting platforms. More recently, my focus has shifted towards managing developer tools, including version control systems and observability platforms. I have worked in diverse industries such as banking, video games, public administration, and telecommunications, and have gained international experience across Angola, Brazil, Portugal, and the United Kingdom.
